snippet: News that Goldman Sachs is wooing a former Treasury official has had Wall Street buzzing with talk that Lucas van Praag may be leaving the firm.
abstract: News that Goldman Sachs is wooing a former Treasury official has had Wall Street buzzing with talk that Lucas van Praag may be leaving the firm.

headline.print_headline: Goldman, Still Stinging From Bad Publicity, Seeks a New P.R. Chief
